zlel
    zlel.zlel_p1
    zlel.zlel_p2

zlel_main
    zlel_main.py0 This module contains functions to read, manage and solve circuits.
zlel_p1
    zlel_p1.py This module parses circuit info, and separates it into different data arrays. It also calculates incidence matrix for the given input circuit.
zlel_p3
    zlel_p3.py This module solves more complex circuits containing some non-linear elements such as diodes or transistors using numerical methods.
zlel_p4
    zlel_p4.py This module adds a method to solve dynamic systems, by time discretization.
